item.title: Ancient problems
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

delta:

Post the original code

The upper code is the original one, all I did was add the code if your 50 you can change to Ancients. Otherwise I just edited the messages.

Also what’s the code for 50+ / 49-. I remember my old days in scripting for another game. It’s something with < and > can’t really remember.

[quote=“silly_faggit, post:3, topic:169216”]You have it dont you?

sendMessage(“You need at least level 50 Magic to change!”);

Isnt that what you want to happen?[/quote]

As I said when I add that code wich is in the 2nd code:

else { if (playerLevel[6] == 49) setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You need at least level 50 Magic to change!"); }

Makes my compile to give me loads of errors.

item.title: Ancient problems
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Ok I’m working a little on my ancients on my server. Here’s my code:

case 6552: // Ancient Altar NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You have changed to Normal Magicks!"); } else { if (playerLevel[6] == 50) setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You have changed to Ancient Magicks!"); } break;

How can I make it tell the player if he got lower than 50 (1 - 49) he can’t change I tried loads of stuff.

For Example:

case 6552: // Ancient Altar NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You have changed to Normal Magicks!"); } else { if (playerLevel[6] == 50) setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You have changed to Ancient Magicks!"); } else { if (playerLevel[6] == 49) setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You need at least level 50 Magic to change!"); } break;

If I change it to that, I get loads of errors. Can I only have one other option in that case?

Read full topic
